name: MageSwap
description:
MageSwap is a two-player fighting game with an Undertale-esque battle engine. Face against your friends (or foes) in an intense spell-casting duel!

This game is a submission to the KSU Fall Game Jam 2019, and was tied for 3rd place!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Player 1 Movement/Input

Arrow Keys - Player 2 Movement/Input

Control - Toggle Fullscreen
